ValidationRules.IgnoreWarning: Disable this warning and remove it from being highlighted in Intelli-J IDEA.
ValidationRules.AlphaNumeric: Generate code that only allows alphanumeric characters in the String, a-z, A-Z, 0-9.

CreditCard.title: Only allow valid credit card numbers.

ValidationRules.CreditCard: Generate code that only allows formatted credit card numbers in input.
ValidationRules.EmailAddress: Generate code that only allows valid email addresses in the input.
ValidationRules.HTTPMinimal: Generate code that only allows valid HTTP and HTTPS URL Addresses.
ValidationRules.SocialSec: Generate code that only allows valid Social Security Numbers.
ValidationRules.ValidFN: Generate code that only allows valid file names, with a name, a dot, and an extension.
ValidationRules.RestrictedFN: Generate code that only allows certain file names.
ValidationRules.RestrictedFE: Generate code that only allows certain file extensions.
